Inspired by my adoration for the legacy of Godzilla, this zine pays homage to the giant in many ways. The first of which being the custom typeface for the title. Taking inspiration from original artwork for the film's Criterion collection

Silver Screen
Publication - 2023

Description

A special edition zine focusing on cinema, featuring an exclusive look at Godzilla. Winter 2023 special, celebrating the upcoming 70th anniversary of the original film's release.

Tools

Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Indesign
